verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <S%H1696><s%> spake יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to מֹשֶׁ֥ה <S%H4872><s%> unto Moses לֵּאמֹֽר <S%H559><s%> saying

דַּבֵּ֞ר <S%H1696><s%> Speak אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲדַ֧ת <S%H5712><s%> unto all the congregation בְּנֵי־ <S%H1121><s%> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֛ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel וְאָמַרְתָּ֥ <S%H559><s%> and say אֲלֵהֶ֖ם <S%H413><s%> to קְדֹשִׁ֣ים <S%H6918><s%> unto them Ye shall be holy תִּהְי֑וּ <S%H1961><s%> become כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for קָד֔וֹשׁ <S%H6918><s%> [am] holy אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> for I the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> every man אִמּ֤וֹ <S%H517><s%> his mother וְאָבִיו֙ <S%H1><s%> and his father תִּירָ֔אוּ <S%H3372><s%> Ye shall fear וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שַׁבְּתֹתַ֖י <S%H7676><s%> my sabbaths תִּשְׁמֹ֑רוּ <S%H8104><s%> and keep אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

אַל־ <S%H408><s%> not תִּפְנוּ֙ <S%H6437><s%> Turn אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הָ֣אֱלִילִ֔ים <S%H457><s%> ye not unto idols וֵֽאלֹהֵי֙ <S%H430><s%> gods מַסֵּכָ֔ה <S%H4541><s%> to yourselves molten לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> or תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <S%H6213><s%> nor make לָכֶ֑ם אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וְכִ֧י <S%H3588><s%> now when תִזְבְּח֛וּ <S%H2076><s%> And if ye offer זֶ֥בַח <S%H2077><s%> a sacrifice שְׁלָמִ֖ים <S%H8002><s%> of peace offerings לַיהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD לִֽרְצֹנְכֶ֖ם <S%H7522><s%> it at your own will תִּזְבָּחֻֽהוּ׃ <S%H2076><s%> ye shall offer

בְּי֧וֹם <S%H3117><s%> the same day זִבְחֲכֶ֛ם <S%H2077><s%> ye offer יֵאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> It shall be eaten וּמִֽמָּחֳרָ֑ת <S%H4283><s%> it and on the morrow וְהַנּוֹתָר֙ <S%H3498><s%> and if ought remain עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until י֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֔י <S%H7992><s%> until the third בָּאֵ֖שׁ <S%H784><s%> in the fire יִשָּׂרֵֽף׃ <S%H8313><s%> it shall be burnt

וְאִ֛ם <S%H518><s%> if הֵאָכֹ֥ל <S%H3605><s%> it יֵאָכֵ֖ל <S%H398><s%> And if it be eaten בַּיּ֣וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֑י <S%H7992><s%> on the third פִּגּ֥וּל <S%H6292><s%> it [is] abominable ה֖וּא <S%H1931><s%> he לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵרָצֶֽה׃ <S%H7521><s%> it shall not be accepted

וְאֹֽכְלָיו֙ <S%H398><s%> Therefore [every one] that eateth עֲוֹנ֣וֹ <S%H5771><s%> his iniquity יִשָּׂ֔א <S%H5375><s%> it shall bear כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> the hallowed thing יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD חִלֵּ֑ל <S%H2490><s%> because he hath profaned וְנִכְרְתָ֛ה <S%H3772><s%> shall be cut off הַנֶּ֥פֶשׁ <S%H5315><s%> and that soul הַהִ֖וא <S%H1931><s%> he מֵעַמֶּֽיהָ׃ <S%H5971><s%> from among his people

וּֽבְקֻצְרְכֶם֙ <S%H7114><s%> And when ye reap אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> קְצִ֣יר <S%H7105><s%> the harvest אַרְצְכֶ֔ם <S%H776><s%> of your land לֹ֧א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְכַלֶּ֛ה <S%H3615><s%> thou shalt not wholly reap פְּאַ֥ת <S%H6285><s%> the corners שָׂדְךָ֖ <S%H7704><s%> of thy field לִקְצֹ֑ר <S%H7614><s%> Sheba וְלֶ֥קֶט <S%H3951><s%> the gleanings קְצִֽירְךָ֖ <S%H7105><s%> of thy harvest לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְלַקֵּֽט׃ <S%H3950><s%> neither shalt thou gather

וְכַרְמְךָ֙ <S%H3754><s%> thy vineyard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> Nor תְעוֹלֵ֔ל <S%H5953><s%> And thou shalt not glean וּפֶ֥רֶט <S%H6528><s%> [every] grape כַּרְמְךָ֖ <S%H3754><s%> of thy vineyard לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְלַקֵּ֑ט <S%H3950><s%> neither shalt thou gather לֶֽעָנִ֤י <S%H6041><s%> them for the poor וְלַגֵּר֙ <S%H1616><s%> and stranger תַּעֲזֹ֣ב <S%H5800><s%> thou shalt leave אֹתָ֔ם <S%H853><s%> אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3069><s%> God אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

לֹ֖א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִּגְנֹ֑בוּ <S%H1589><s%> Ye shall not steal וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְכַחֲשׁ֥וּ <S%H3584><s%> neither deal falsely וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְשַׁקְּר֖וּ <S%H8266><s%> neither lie אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> one בַּעֲמִיתֽוֹ׃ <S%H5997><s%> to another

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשָּׁבְע֥וּ <S%H7650><s%> And ye shall not swear בִשְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> by my name לַשָּׁ֑קֶר <S%H8267><s%> falsely וְחִלַּלְתָּ֛ <S%H2490><s%> neither shalt thou profane אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שֵׁ֥ם <S%H8034><s%> the name אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> of thy God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַעֲשֹׁ֥ק <S%H6231><s%> Thou shalt not defraud אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> רֵֽעֲךָ֖ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִגְזֹ֑ל <S%H1497><s%> neither rob לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תָלִ֞ין <S%H3885><s%> shall not abide פְּעֻלַּ֥ת <S%H6468><s%> [him] the wages שָׂכִ֛יר <S%H7916><s%> of him that is hired אִתְּךָ֖ <S%H854><s%> for עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> until בֹּֽקֶר׃ <S%H1242><s%> with thee all night until the morning

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תְקַלֵּ֣ל <S%H7043><s%> Thou shalt not curse חֵרֵ֔שׁ <S%H2795><s%> the deaf וְלִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before עִוֵּ֔ר <S%H5787><s%> the blind לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תִתֵּ֖ן <S%H5414><s%> nor put מִכְשֹׁ֑ל <S%H4383><s%> a stumblingblock וְיָרֵ֥אתָ <S%H3372><s%> but shalt fear מֵּאֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> no תַעֲשׂ֥וּ <S%H6213><s%> Ye shall do עָ֙וֶל֙ <S%H5766><s%> no unrighteousness בַּמִּשְׁפָּ֔ט <S%H4941><s%> in judgment לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִשָּׂ֣א <S%H5375><s%> thou shalt not respect פְנֵי־ <S%H6440><s%> the person דָ֔ל <S%H1800><s%> of the poor וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֶהְדַּ֖ר <S%H1921><s%> nor honour פְּנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> the person גָד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of the mighty בְּצֶ֖דֶק <S%H6664><s%> [but] in righteousness תִּשְׁפֹּ֥ט <S%H8199><s%> shalt thou judge עֲמִיתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H5997><s%> thy neighbour

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תֵלֵ֤ךְ <S%H1980><s%> go רָכִיל֙ <S%H7400><s%> up and down [as] a talebearer בְּעַמֶּ֔יךָ <S%H5971><s%> among thy people לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> are not תַעֲמֹ֖ד <S%H5975><s%> neither shalt thou stand עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> against דַּ֣ם <S%H1818><s%> against the blood רֵעֶ֑ךָ <S%H7453><s%> of thy neighbour אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשְׂנָ֥א <S%H8130><s%> Thou shalt not hate אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אָחִ֖יךָ <S%H251><s%> thy brother בִּלְבָבֶ֑ךָ <S%H3824><s%> in thine heart הוֹכֵ֤חַ <S%H3198><s%> thou shalt in any wise תּוֹכִ֙יחַ֙ <S%H3198><s%> rebuke אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> עֲמִיתֶ֔ךָ <S%H5997><s%> thy neighbour וְלֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall not תִשָּׂ֥א <S%H5375><s%> and not suffer עָלָ֖יו <S%H5921><s%> because חֵֽטְא׃ <S%H2399><s%> sin

לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִקֹּ֤ם <S%H5358><s%> Thou shalt not avenge וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִטֹּר֙ <S%H5201><s%> nor bear any grudge אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> against the children עַמֶּ֔ךָ <S%H5971><s%> of thy people וְאָֽהַבְתָּ֥ <S%H157><s%> but thou shalt love לְרֵעֲךָ֖ <S%H7453><s%> thy neighbour כָּמ֑וֹךָ <S%H3644><s%> as thyself אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> I [am] the LORD

אֶֽת־ <S%H853><s%> חֻקֹּתַי֮ <S%H2708><s%> my statutes תִּשְׁמֹרוּ֒ <S%H8104><s%> Ye shall keep בְּהֶמְתְּךָ֙ <S%H929><s%> Thou shalt not let thy cattle לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תַרְבִּ֣יעַ <S%H7250><s%> gender כִּלְאַ֔יִם <S%H3610><s%> with a diverse kind שָׂדְךָ֖ <S%H7704><s%> thy field לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor תִזְרַ֣ע <S%H2232><s%> thou shalt not sow כִּלְאָ֑יִם <S%H3610><s%> with mingled seed וּבֶ֤גֶד <S%H899><s%> neither shall a garment כִּלְאַ֙יִם֙ <S%H3610><s%> mingled שַֽׁעַטְנֵ֔ז <S%H8162><s%> of linen and woollen לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יַעֲלֶ֖ה <S%H5927><s%> come עָלֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H5921><s%> and פ

וְ֠אִישׁ <S%H376><s%> And whosoever כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> now if יִשְׁכַּ֨ב <S%H7901><s%> lieth אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with אִשָּׁ֜ה <S%H802><s%> with a woman שִׁכְבַת־ <S%H7902><s%> seed זֶ֗רַע <S%H2233><s%> child וְהִ֤וא <S%H1931><s%> who שִׁפְחָה֙ <S%H8198><s%> that [is] a bondmaid נֶחֱרֶ֣פֶת <S%H2778><s%> betrothed לְאִ֔ישׁ <S%H376><s%> to an husband וְהָפְדֵּה֙ <S%H6299><s%> and not at all לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> no נִפְדָּ֔תָה <S%H6299><s%> redeemed א֥וֹ <S%H176><s%> and חֻפְשָׁ֖ה <S%H2668><s%> nor freedom לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor נִתַּן־ <S%H5414><s%> given לָ֑הּ בִּקֹּ֧רֶת <S%H1244><s%> her she shall be scourged תִּהְיֶ֛ה <S%H1961><s%> become לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor יוּמְת֖וּ <S%H4191><s%> they shall not be put to death כִּי־ <S%H3588><s%> because לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor חֻפָּֽשָׁה׃ <S%H2666><s%> because she was not free

וְהֵבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> And he shall bring אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֲשָׁמוֹ֙ <S%H817><s%> his trespass offering לַֽיהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> unto the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to פֶּ֖תַח <S%H6607><s%> unto the door אֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> of the congregation אֵ֖יל <S%H352><s%> [even] a ram אָשָֽׁם׃ <S%H817><s%> for a trespass offering

וְכִפֶּר֩ <S%H3722><s%> shall make an atonement עָלָ֨יו <S%H5921><s%> and הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <S%H3548><s%> And the priest בְּאֵ֤יל <S%H352><s%> for him with the ram הָֽאָשָׁם֙ <S%H817><s%> of the trespass offering לִפְנֵ֣י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> for חַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> for his sin אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָ֑א <S%H2398><s%> which he hath done וְנִסְלַ֣ח <S%H5545><s%> shall be forgiven ל֔וֹ מֵחַטָּאת֖וֹ <S%H2403><s%> and the sin אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which חָטָֽא׃ <S%H2398><s%> which he hath done פ

וְכִי־ <S%H3588><s%> When תָבֹ֣אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when ye shall come אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הָאָ֗רֶץ <S%H776><s%> into the land וּנְטַעְתֶּם֙ <S%H5193><s%> and shall have planted כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> all manner of trees מַאֲכָ֔ל <S%H3978><s%> for food וַעֲרַלְתֶּ֥ם <S%H6188><s%> shall count עָרְלָת֖וֹ <S%H6190><s%> forbidden אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְי֑וֹ <S%H6529><s%> the fruit שָׁלֹ֣שׁ <S%H7969><s%> three שָׁנִ֗ים <S%H8141><s%> years יִהְיֶ֥ה <S%H1961><s%> become לָכֶ֛ם עֲרֵלִ֖ים <S%H6189><s%> shall it be as uncircumcised לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not יֵאָכֵֽל׃ <S%H398><s%> unto you it shall not be eaten

וּבַשָּׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> year הָרְבִיעִ֔ת <S%H7243><s%> But in the fourth יִהְיֶ֖ה <S%H1961><s%> become כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all פִּרְי֑וֹ <S%H6529><s%> all the fruit קֹ֥דֶשׁ <S%H6944><s%> thereof shall be holy הִלּוּלִ֖ים <S%H1974><s%> to praise לַיהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> the LORD

וּבַשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> year הַחֲמִישִׁ֗ת <S%H2549><s%> And in the fifth תֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <S%H398><s%> shall ye eat אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> פִּרְי֔וֹ <S%H6529><s%> of the fruit לְהוֹסִ֥יף <S%H3254><s%> thereof that it may yield לָכֶ֖ם תְּבוּאָת֑וֹ <S%H8393><s%> unto you the increase אֲנִ֖י <S%H589><s%> I יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> thereof I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תֹאכְל֖וּ <S%H398><s%> Ye shall not eat עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> with הַדָּ֑ם <S%H1818><s%> [any thing] with the blood לֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְנַחֲשׁ֖וּ <S%H6049><s%> nor observe times וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> nor תְעוֹנֵֽנוּ׃ <S%H5172><s%> neither shall ye use enchantment
